Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Seismic fortification - Take precautions before they happen" (抗震设防 防患未然), this poster show the preventive measure alluded to in the previous poster: designing earthquake-proof buildings and structures.
